attributes.action: OfGem should have the power to force Gas and Electric rates down
attributes.additional_details: Currently OfGem seem to only advise energy companies on what is and isn't fair.  Our Gas and Electricity prices are increasing to a level that is becoming unmanagable for most people.  Wholesale prices are going down, and have been for a long time, yet prices to our homes increases.  We have seen a 50% rise in 10 years.  If not OfGem, then who can prevent these companies from bleeding the public dry?
